info.official_title: A Prospective Study of Dabigatran Etexilate as Primary Treatment of Malignancy Associated Venous Thromboembolism
info.inclusion_criteria:
1. are aged 18 years or above;
2. have acute symptomatic deep vein thrombosis or pulmonary embolism with objective confirmation;
3. have active cancer, which is defined as a diagnosis of cancer other than basal cell or squamous cell carcinoma of skin within six months before enrollment, any treatment for cancer within the previous six months or recurrent or metastatic cancer.
4. Female subjects of childbearing potential should be willing to use 2 methods of birth control or be surgically sterile, or abstain from heterosexual activity for the course of the study through 120 days after the last dose of study medication. Subjects of childbearing potential are those who have not been surgically sterilized or have not been free from menses for > 1 year.
5. Male subjects should agree to use an adequate method of contraception starting with the first dose of study therapy through 120 days after the last dose of study therapy.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years

identified_line.line: 1. are aged 18 years or above;
2. have acute symptomatic deep vein thrombosis or pulmonary embolism with objective confirmation;

3. have active cancer, which is defined as a diagnosis of cancer other than basal cell or squamous cell carcinoma of skin within six months before enrollment, any treatment for cancer within the previous six months or recurrent or metastatic cancer.

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
1. have Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status score of > 2 at the time of randomization;

criterions.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status score of > 2

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status score of > 2

identified_line.line: 2. have life expectancy of less than 3 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: life expectancy of less than 3 months

and_criteria.exact_snippets: life expectancy of less than 3 months

identified_line.line: 3. have active bleeding, are at high risk of bleeding, or have contraindications to anticoagulant treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: are at high risk of bleeding

or_criteria.exact_snippets: are at high risk of bleeding

identified_line.line: 4. receive thrombectomy or fibrinolytic agent to treat the current episode of VTE;
5. receive more than 72 hours pre-treatment with therapeutic dosages of anticoagulant treatment prior to randomization to treat the current VTE episode;

criterions.exact_snippets: receive more than 72 hours pre-treatment with therapeutic dosages of anticoagulant treatment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: receive more than 72 hours pre-treatment with therapeutic dosages of anticoagulant treatment

identified_line.line: 6. are already on long term oral anticoagulation;

criterions.exact_snippets: are already on long term oral anticoagulation
are already on long term oral anticoagulation

and_criteria.exact_snippets: are already on long term oral anticoagulation
are already on long term oral anticoagulation

identified_line.line: 8. have platelet count of less than 100 x 109/L;

criterions.exact_snippets: platelet count of less than 100 x 109/L

and_criteria.exact_snippets: platelet count of less than 100 x 109/L

identified_line.line: 9. are on dual antiplatelet therapy;
10. have a serum creatinine level of more than 220 umol/L or have a calculated creatinine clearance (CrCl) of less than 30 ml/min;

criterions.exact_snippets: serum creatinine level of more than 220 umol/L
calculated creatinine clearance (CrCl) of less than 30 ml/min

or_criteria.exact_snippets: serum creatinine level of more than 220 umol/L
calculated creatinine clearance (CrCl) of less than 30 ml/min

identified_line.line: 11. have alanine aminotransferase level more than 2 times the upper limit of normal range or cirrhosis;

criterions.exact_snippets: alanine aminotransferase level more than 2 times the upper limit of normal range

expected_value.unit: times the upper limit of normal range

or_criteria.exact_snippets: alanine aminotransferase level more than 2 times the upper limit of normal range

expected_value.unit: times the upper limit of normal range

identified_line.line: 12. have history of heparin induced thrombocytopenia;
13. are on treatment of potent inhibitors or inducers of P-glycoprotein.

criterions.exact_snippets: treatment of potent inhibitors or inducers of P-glycoprotein
criterions.criterion: treatment with P-glycoprotein inhibitors or inducers

or_criteria.exact_snippets: treatment of potent inhibitors or inducers of P-glycoprotein
or_criteria.criterion: treatment with P-glycoprotein inhibitors or inducers

identified_line.line: 14. Is pregnant or breastfeeding, or expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the screening visit through 120 days after the last dose of trial treatment.

4. Female subjects of childbearing potential should be willing to use 2 methods of birth control or be surgically sterile, or abstain from heterosexual activity for the course of the study through 120 days after the last dose of study medication. Subjects of childbearing potential are those who have not been surgically sterilized or have not been free from menses for > 1 year.

for the course of the study through 120 days after the last dose of study medication

identified_line.line: 7. are on low molecular weight heparin for indications other than VTE;
